[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@secured-finance/stablecoin-lib-ethers](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersConnectionOptionalParams](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.ethersconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [userAddress](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.ethersconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md)

## EthersConnectionOptionalParams.userAddress property

Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, ProtocolToken Stake and balances will be read by default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly userAddress?: string;
```

## Remarks

For example [getTrove(address?)](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoin.gettrove.md) will return the Trove owned by `userAddress` when the `address` parameter is omitted.

Should be omitted when connecting through a [Signer](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssigner.md)<!-- -->. Instead `userAddress` will be automatically determined from the `Signer`<!-- -->.
